name: Endus
description:
A Spooky, minimalist game about a cute ghost name Endus. He is being chased by Boogy the Monster and there are obstacles to avoid during the escape. Can you set the highest record for his run!?

------------Controls------------

Move with Up and Down arrow keys to avoid Buds and press Escape (Esc) key to pause the game.
